name: BurningManCountdown
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill contains a single feed, updated in real time, that counts down the number of days until the Man burns. It is read by Alexa as part of the user's Flash Briefing. After enabling the skill, simply ask Alexa for your flash briefing and she will read the countdown along with any other flash briefing updates you have waiting.

Burning Man is a festival organized by the non-profit Burning Man Project every year. This skill is not officially associated with BMORG in any way and uses only public domain information and assets to operate.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
